description: This file defines a Spring Boot configuration class WebConfig that sets up global Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) policies by configuring allowed origins, methods, headers, and credentials for the web application.

classes.name: WebConfig
classes.description: A configuration class implementing WebMvcConfigurer to customize Spring MVC web configuration, specifically to set global CORS policies.

methods.name: addCorsMappings
methods.description: Overrides the default method to add CORS mappings with specific allowed origins, methods, headers, and credentials settings.
